verbs.description: LOS ANGELES ( AP ) — A day after [ARG0: Stormy Daniels] [V: accused] [ARG1: her former lawyer] [ARG2: of being a " puppet " for President Donald Trump] , the attorney countersued the porn star and her new attorney
